project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line interface (CLI) contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts.

task.name: Implement the functionality to add a contact
Implement the functionality to search for a contact
Implement the functionality to update a contact
Implement the functionality to delete a contact
Implement functionality to store contacts in a JSON file
Implement the user interface for interacting via the terminal
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly
